message: I speak from experience: it happened in my hometown. People there aren't in a position to pass up cheaper prices. If they'd known Wal-mart was going to jack the prices back up after they ran everyone out of business, perhaps they'd have done something differently, but everyone wants to save money. Watch this. It's insightful.

This is actually a very known situation, when a country tries to raise its moral by establishing some sort of """"enemy"""", and hopes to engage its people to fight against this """"enemy"""". Argentina tried the same thing against UK. However, as history shows us, it didn't work.

The pyramids were not tombs. Not a single body has ever been found in one. They are Tesla coils, used to power the atmosphere, to aid in things like lifting heavy blocks and communicating signals around the planet. Just watch this. It's short but you will understand

The FBI released a statement saying there was nothing prosecutorial in Clinton's emails, but it was like this went on the back page while they were making it look otherwise. Really criminal action on their part and almost brought down the director of the FBI, but Trump exonerated him because he was acting in Trump's favor. He should have been fired.
